text: Hi  anyone facing issues with dbs yuu amex transaction deny?

Gotten this issue only today after I made 2 transactions on Singtel kiosk. Then the 3rd transaction got denied. Called dbs regarding this and they have to do a bypass (waited for like 1hr). But when I go to cold storage now and i face the same issue again and they are doing the same thing again.

Consider ocbc 360 with salary credit
So u mean that card up does not repay the loan but puts the money into the account the giro is suppose to deduct?
I will recommend HeyMax. Get some HeyMax miles while at the same time get the qualified spend into UOB One. HeyMax uses 5311 Departmental Store so no issues qualifying.

eligible for 100 quarterly cashback if fulfil 1k eligible spend in each of jul  Aug  sep calendar month. No need care what is the amount in your statement month

I seem to recall they go by calendar month and I scrambled for it when I first got the card and got the quarterly rebate.You should be good for it unless they suddenly changed T&C.I chiong the April month and still got $200 for the quarter.
read the TnC  insurance and utilities excluded

Hi I‚Äôm sorry this is a basic qn. If I am charged credit card annual fee which i manage to waive after calling the bank  but they say that the waiver will only be reflected in the following months statement. If this credit card bill is usually paid via bank GIRO  does that mean the current bill (including the annual fee) will be automatically deducted via GIRO first regardless?
Hi  I seldom use Grab for rides. I have a day trip to KL. Will the Grab MCC for rides allow me to clock 4mpd on Amaze CRMC combo that I'll link to Grab app? Thanks
Have done grab + amaze & crmc combo in Malaysia before. Should work.
You will be charged additional 3% in MYR for using foreign card
Didn't know this. I guess this is the same for using trust card with grab too?
Hey guyss! For the UOB preferred card limit  is the bonus spent limit based on posted date or the date of the transaction?
How long did it take to get approved
yes  any "foreign" credit card (cards not issued in country of using grab) will be charged additional cost
I suppose. Think this foreign fee only start end of June 24.Previously there wasn't such fee
UserAhas 1/3 warnings; be careful!Reason:no irrelevant links allowed
Since Mar 24 for Grab SG. Other countries may have been earlier/later  like Thailand was back in Dec 23 and Philippines was back in Apr 24.
Poor form by Maybank though  silently nerfing since 20 Jun and only updated T&C subsequently.
Maybank quite long to approve. Probably 1 - 2 weeks to receive the card. Dunno why. And I only requested for $2500 credit limit. ü§£
Seems like another round of amaze vs UOB blame game ü§≠
